content: A large net realizable value or NRV inventory adjustment at Dolores increased all in sustaining costs at that operation by $321 per ounce, and increased consolidated gold segment all in sustaining costs by $94 per ounce. Many more meetings than what we've seen last year, obviously, due to COVID as I explained that in earlier calls, got a lengthy delay for the two years of COVID that we saw that really didn't allow the Ministry of Mines to call meetings with a lot of people in person for obvious reasons.
